EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.000:
OK, I've got some good news and some bad
news. Which do you want to hear first?
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.001:
Good news! Then I can pretend I didn't
hear the bad news afterward.
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.002:
Alright! Well, if you can believe it, they're
finally done rebuilding the [color=0001]train station[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.003: Ay? Ay?! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Seriously? It's actually done?!)
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.004:
Wow! That took forever, but it's gonna be
totally worth the wait.
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.005:
Ay! Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Yeah! Now we can get to Inkopolis
and back in a flash!)
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.006: Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](So, wait... What's the bad news?)
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.007:
Folks from Inkopolis can also come HERE.
Our TURF. Think of how hard parking will be!
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.008:
What? Noooooo! I can barely find a place
to park my eels as it is!
EventFlowMsg/News_IntroFsodr.009:
...Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](...But if they're riding the train,
why would they need to park?)

EventFlowMsg/News_LeagueBeingHeld.000:
Hey, it looks like there's a Challenge
available today!
EventFlowMsg/News_LeagueBeingHeld.001: Check out the rules, then give it a shot!

EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop.000:
Ooo, we have a special announcement from
Grizzco Industries...
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop.001: Ay. Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Uh-oh. What is it?)
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop.002:
Oh, I think it's good news. Maybe? They're
looking for volunteers for [color=0001]Eggstra Work[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop.003:
Ay. Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Oh, it's available right now. So it IS
good news, if you want Eggstra Work.)
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop.004:
Yep! If you want to get in on it, call up
some friends and head over to Grizzco.
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop.005:
Is it weird that I love Eggstra Work? Just
another chance for my team to dominate!

EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop_Short.000:
We've got a note from Grizzco...
[color=0001]Eggstra Work [color=ffff]is available now!
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop_Short.001:
Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](If you want in on it, grab some friends
and head to Grizzco.)
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop_Short.010: Hop to it, workers! If you want to.
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop_Short.011:
Yeah, grab some work buds and build
those teamwork connections!
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop_Short.020:
Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](You get a commemorative gift
for doing [color=0001]Eggstra Work[color=ffff], right?)
EventFlowMsg/News_LimitedCoop_Short.021: Oh, yeah! I wonder what it'll be this time...

EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.000:
Oh, this is exciting. The [color=0001]new season[color=ffff]
has started!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.002:
Ay! Ay.[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Yes! Chill Season! I can't wait to
break out my sweaters and get cozy.)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.003:
Well, don't get TOO cozy. Looks like an
intense new mode is here. [color=0001]X Battles[color=ffff] are go!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.005:
Ay. Ay.[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Whoa. Looks like you need to be
ranked [color=0001]Ｓ+[size=75%]0[size=100%] or higher[color=ffff] to try it.)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.006:
Look out, world. I'm gonna blaze a path
to the top spot.
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.007: I'm here for the shiny [color=0001]new weapons[color=ffff], duh!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.008:
Ay. Ay?[group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Those look cool. Are any of 'em
fin operated? Asking for me.)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.008_01:
So pretty... Which one will be my new main?
I'll have to splat test 'em all...
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.009:
Knock yourself out. I'll just listen to what
Sheldon says. I might be the only one...
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.010:
Listening? No time for it. Not when
[color=0001]NEW STAGES[color=ffff] JUST DROPPED!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.011:
Ay. Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (I'll still make time for listening.
But those new stages do look good...)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season02.012:
You mean good for [color=0001]battling[color=ffff], right? 'Cause
that's what they're there for!

EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.000: Ay! Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (Yes! The [color=0001]new season[color=ffff] has started!)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.001: Ahahaha! Yes! I'm here for it.
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.002:
Well, well! Let's see what Frye is here
for, shall we?
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.014:
Up next, we have the latest from
Grizzco Industries.
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.014_01:
AAAY! Ay. Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](AAAUGH! I mean...aaah.
What is that...horrifying...thing?)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.015:
I think it's cool! Apparently a [color=0001]new type[color=ffff]
[color=0001]of King Salmonid [color=ffff]has been sighted!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.016:
Hm. The picture we have isn't the highest
quality. I can't quite make it out...
EventFlowMsg/News_Season03.017:
Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I have a feeling there may be some
real-life sightings, so watch out!)

EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.000:
Oh, this is exciting. The [color=0001]new season[color=ffff]
has started!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.002:
Aaay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I'm ready! Nothing like a fresh
start to get my fins aflapping.)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.003:
Ooo! It looks like [color=0001]Challenges [color=ffff]have been
added to the mix! Keep an eye out for them.
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.004:
YES. Look out, world. Frye's comin' for ya!
...Wait—what are Challenges again?
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.005:
They're special events that might have
different rules or restrictions than usual.
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.006:
Ay? Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](And they're kind of random, right?
So if you see one, you should check it out!)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.018:
It looks like Grizzco has opened up
a [color=0001]new job site[color=ffff]!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.019:
Ay. Ay? [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Oh. That's it, huh? I was picturing
more of an open office with foosball...)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.020:
Looks like it's ripe for collecting Golden Eggs
to me. Employee of the Month, here I come!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season04.021:
Ay... [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Just...try not to fall into the ocean
this time...)

EventFlowMsg/News_Season05.000: Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Yes! The [color=0001]new season[color=ffff] has started!)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season05.001: Ahahaha! Yes! I'm here for it.
EventFlowMsg/News_Season05.002:
Well, well! Let's see what Frye is here
for, shall we?

EventFlowMsg/News_Season06.000:
Oh, this is exciting. The [color=0001]new season[color=ffff]
has started!
EventFlowMsg/News_Season06.002:
Aaay! Ay. [group=0004 type=0005 params=](I'm ready! Nothing like a fresh
start to get my fins aflapping.)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season06.008_1:
Ay! Ay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=](Ooo! It looks like everyone gets a
[color=0001]Sheldon License[color=ffff] as a gift after this! Neat!)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season06.009:
Ammo Knights will have a line out the door.
Especially if folks listen to Sheldon's spiels.

EventFlowMsg/News_Season07.000: Ayay! [group=0004 type=0005 params=] (A [color=0001]new season[color=ffff] has begun!)
EventFlowMsg/News_Season07.002:
Well then, we don't we take a look in order
at what's available now!

EventFlowMsg/News_SeasonEndBonus.000:
Ooo, important reminder. The season is
nearly over!
EventFlowMsg/News_SeasonEndBonus.001:
Ay![group=0004 type=0005 params=] (And you know what that means... You
can earn more [color=0001]Catalog Points[color=ffff] than normal!)
EventFlowMsg/News_SeasonEndBonus.002:
Right. So if there's something you've had
your eye on, now's the time to make a push!

EventFlowMsg/News_SeasonPost.001:
That's the spirit, Frye. Let's all hit the
ground running at the start of the season!
EventFlowMsg/News_SeasonPost.002:
As long as you're all running FROM me.
Muhahaha! Let's goooooo!

EventFlowMsg/Plaza_IntroStation.000:
Construction on the train station is complete,
so you can now visit [color=0001]Inkopolis [color=ffff]with ease![page break]Don't know Inkopolis? Well, it's a bit like
Splatsville, but a little more...shiny.
EventFlowMsg/Plaza_IntroStation.001:
Here's the entrance to the [color=0001]train station[color=ffff].[page break]Now that it's easier to go back and forth, we're
hearing that all shops are better stocked...
EventFlowMsg/Plaza_IntroStation.002:
So if you've had your eye on some new gear,
it's a great time to do a little shopping!
